full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Level 3 Programmer/Software Developer

### Government of Canada

#### Solicitation Number
1000453964

#### Tender Closing Date
Wednesday, July 27, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

#### Expected Contract Start Date
Monday, August 14, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date
Friday, August 13, 2026

### Description
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a Level 3 Programmer/Software Developer to support the development and maintenance of applications and software running on IBM ODM.

The successful contractor will be responsible for:

* Analyzing, developing, and supporting software applications and architectures
* Providing expertise in application and software architecture concepts and strong analytical and communication skills
* Collaborating with project team members to develop and maintain software applications and support multiple releases

### Technical Requirements
* Programming skills, specifically in a Level 3 environment
* Strong understanding of application and software architecture concepts
* Experience with IBM ODM and supporting software releases

### End User Entities
The CBSA is the end-user entity for this tender.

### Contracting Entity
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Vikki McMurren
	+ Email: vikki.mcmurren@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (519) 613-5715
	+ Address: 355 North River Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0L8

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7165/1000453964---npp---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7165/1000453964---npp---en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7165/1000453964---npp---fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7165/1000453964---npp---fr.pdf)

### Important Details
* Tender status: Expired
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Canada, National Capital Region (NCR)
